articles.author: Joe Wallace
articles.title: Tech Stocks Set for More Losses After Nasdaq Sinks - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Global markets follow Wall Street lower, with technology shares retreating in Europe
articles.content: Technology stocks were poised for further losses at the opening bell after getting clobbered by investors concerned about likely interest-rate rises.Futures for the technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 edged … [+4450 chars]

articles.title: Gay cake row: Activist loses discrimination case after Christian bakery refused to make 'Support Gay Marriage' cake - The Telegraph
articles.description: Case reached European Court of Human Rights, but it was ruled inadmissible as the panel said Mr Lee failed to 'exhaust domestic remedies'
articles.content:
The Christian Institute welcomed a ruling by the European Court of Human Rights that a complaint in the "gay cake" case was inadmissible.
Spokesman Simon Calvert said: "This is the right result.

articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: ‘Gay cake’ complaint ruled inadmissible by European court - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The ECHR said Gareth Lee failed to ‘exhaust domestic remedies’ in the long-running legal dispute.
articles.content: A complaint by a Northern Ireland gay rights activist that he had been discriminated against when the Christian owners of a bakery refused to make him a cake iced with the slogan Support Gay Marriage… [+1993 chars]
